title: Searge: 近期内将发布1.9预发布版，但没有保证
author: lichi2050
txt_content:
本帖最后由 bobby825 于 2016-2-12 10:27 编辑 


Searge：We should also be close to a pre release. But no promises yet, things could always turn out to be more complicated than anticipated.Searge：我们已经接近发布pre release（1.9）了 . 但不保证，因为事情总是有可能会比预期的更复杂.
Searge：Turns out some mobs thought they were allowed to be smarter than they should be and they stole copy cycles to accomplish it. Bloody thieves.Searge：一些怪物以为他们被允许变的更聪明，它们偷走了copy cycles（周期复制）达到这个目的. 真是残忍的小偷.
Searge：I think we found one major cause of lag in the 1.9 snapshots today and solved it. Profiling it was painful but totally worth it.Searge：我觉得我们找到了造成1.9快照lag（卡）的主要原因之一并修复了它. 将它分析是痛苦的但是完全值得.
至于什么时候发布...仔细看16w06a快照的图片 http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-514747-1-1.html （请查看第9楼回复）
